code: import MyPosts from'./MyPosts';import{addPostActionCreater}from'../../../redux/profile-reducer';import{connect}from'react-redux';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{newPostState:state.profilePage.newPostState,posts:state.profilePage.postsData};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addPost:function addPost(newPostText){dispatch(addPostActionCreater(newPostText));}};};var MyPostsContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(MyPosts);export default MyPostsContainer;
